snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel on Monday rejected remarks by Turkey's president accusing officials of "Nazi practices," days after a local authority in Germany prevented a Turkish minister from addressing a rally....

headline.main: AP-NORC Poll: Political Divide Over American Identity
headline.print_headline: AP-NORC Poll: Political Divide Over American Identity

lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel on Monday rejected remarks by Turkey's president accusing officials of "Nazi practices," days after a local authority in Germany prevented a Turkish minister from addressing a rally.
